'[/set]'; } my $def_string; if($CGI->{ui_save_t_in_page}) { $def_string = $CGI->{ui_definition}; } else { $def_string = $CGI->{ui_short_definition}; } $def_string =~ s/\r\n?/\n/g; unshift @layout, '[' . "comment]\n$def_string\n[" . "/comment]\n"; foreach $one (@layout) { if( $one eq 'UI_CONTENT') { my $content = shift @insert; $content =~ s/\r?\n/\n/g; $content = "\n\n$content\n\n"; #Log("inserting $content"); push @out, $content; } elsif ($one =~ /^[A-Z]\w+$/) { push @out, '@_' . $one . '_@'; #Log("inserted variable $one"); } else { push @out, $one; #Log("inserted set $one"); } } my $page = $Tag->filter('filesafe', $CGI->{ui_page}); if( ! $page) { $Scratch->{ui_error} = errmsg("No page name given."); $Tag->bounce('__UI_BASE__/error'); return; } $page = "pages/$page" if $page !~ m{^pages/}; $page .= $Config->{HTMLsuffix} unless $page =~ /$Config->{HTMLsuffix}$/; #Log("final page=$page"); push @out, ''; unless ($Tag->write_relative_file($page, (join "\n", @out))) { $Scratch->{ui_error} = errmsg("Couldn't save page %s.", $page); } $Scratch->{ui_output_page} = $page; return; [/perl] [bounce page="__UI_BASE__/page"]
